Orihuela Costa stretches along pristine beaches including the renowned La Zenia with its Blue Flag status, while inland you'll find lush golf courses, shopping centers, and thriving communities. The area has matured over decades into a genuine town rather than just a tourist zone, with permanent residents, local services, and authentic Spanish character blended seamlessly with international amenities. The region sits 50 kilometers south of Alicante city and benefits from excellent road connections while maintaining a peaceful, unhurried atmosphere.

Restaurants range from international cuisine to authentic Spanish tapas, shopping centers like La Zenia Boulevard offer everything you need, and the beaches are close enough for a weekly visit. Many residents enjoy the flexibility of renting their apartments during peak season, generating income while maintaining their own peaceful retreat.

Local medical centers throughout the area offer general practice services with staff accustomed to treating international residents. Many retirees appreciate the combination of quality healthcare, affordability, and the reassurance of English-language medical support, making healthcare decisions straightforward.
